title: 820-2936 no backlight. Sometimes it has backlight
message:
Hi there!

Have an 820-2936 here where i thought the LVDS cable was the issue. I thought it had no image. When i replaced the LVDS cable it worked for about 5 seconds. then the backlight came on and off repeatedly as if the macbook was going to sleep and waking up. It was a fade backlight animation and not a straight on/off. then backlight went out completely. 

have tried another LVDS and the backlight is completely off with several LDS cables

board looks pristine

title: 820-2936 no backlight. Sometimes it has backlight
message: Check under led driver for corossion? Maybe try reflowing it.

title: 820-2936 no backlight. Sometimes it has backlight
message:
Does the image remain, only backlight goes off?
Check LCD connector first.
Next, check XW9720; continuity between pin2/D9701 and FB/U9701.

Don't forget to measure SMC_LID signal.
